verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time,<s%> while he was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H6113>confined<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> [the earth,] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to <S%H3559>establish<s%> it, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is His <S%H8034>name,<s%>
<S%H7121>'Call<s%> to Me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you, and I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>mighty<s%> <S%H1219>things,<s%> which you do not <S%H3045>know.<s%>'

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which are <S%H5422>broken<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> [to make a defense] <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5550>siege<s%> <S%H5550>mounds<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%>

'While [they] are <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and to <S%H4390>fill<s%> them with the <S%H6297>corpses<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H5221>slain<s%> in My <S%H639>anger<s%> and in My <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and I have <S%H5641>hidden<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their wickedness: <S%H9567><s%>

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> to it <S%H724>health<s%> and <S%H4832>healing,<s%> and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> them; and I will <S%H1540>reveal<s%> to them an <S%H6283>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I will <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> them as they were at <S%H7223>first.<s%>

'And I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Me, and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Me, and by <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against Me.

'And it shall be to Me a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8342>joy,<s%> <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and <S%H8597>glory<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9186>good<s%> that I <S%H6213>do<s%> for them, and they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%> and <S%H7264>tremble<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9186>good<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7965>peace<s%> that I <S%H6213>make<s%> for it.'

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5750>'Yet<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> "It is a <S%H2720>waste,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> "[that is,] in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%>

the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3034>"Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>"; [and of those] who <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H8426>thank<s%> <S%H8426>offering<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> For I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> as they were at <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H559>'says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'There shall <S%H5750>again<s%> be in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> which is <S%H2720>waste,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> or <S%H929>beast,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who <S%H7257>rest<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

'In the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> in the <S%H5439>environs<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> shall <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the one who <S%H4487>numbers<s%> them,' <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'when I will <S%H6965>fulfill<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

'In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time<s%> I will cause a <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth;<s%> and He shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is [the name] by <S%H834>which<s%> she shall be <S%H7121>called:<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is our <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>'

"For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1732>'David<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>lack<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>lack<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> grain <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>' "
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>'If<s%> you can <S%H6565>break<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for the <S%H3915>night,<s%> so that <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> will not be at their <S%H6256>appointed<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%>

then My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> may <S%H1571>also<s%> be <S%H6565>broken<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> that he shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and with the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests,<s%> My <S%H8334>ministers.<s%>

'As the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5608>counted,<s%> and the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H4058>measured,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H8334>minister<s%> to Me.' "
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Have you not <S%H7200>observed<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chose,<s%> He has <S%H3988>rejected<s%> them'? Thus they <S%H5006>despise<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> are they as a <S%H1471>nation<s%> in their <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>'If<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> [for] <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> [stand] not, [and] the <S%H2708>fixed<s%> <S%H2708>patterns<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> I have not <S%H7760>established,<s%>

<S%H1571>then<s%> I would <S%H3988>reject<s%> the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> not <S%H3947>taking<s%> from his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H4910>rulers<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> But I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> their <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> and will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them.' "
